```{r eval=FALSE}
logs <- read_sf("data/Logs/ParticipantStatusLogs1.csv", 
                options = "GEOM_POSSIBLE_NAMES=currentLocation")
```


```{r, echo=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
logs_selected <-  logs %>% 
  mutate(Timestamp = clock::date_time_parse(timestamp,
                                     zone = "",
                                     format = "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S")) %>% 
  mutate(day = clock::get_day(Timestamp)) %>% 
  filter(currentMode == "Transport")
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
write_rds(logs_selected,
          "data/rds/logs_selected.rds")
```

```{r}
logs_selected <- read_rds("data/rds/logs_selected.rds")
```

```{r}
hex <- st_make_grid(buildings,
                    cellsize = 100,
                    square = FALSE) %>% 
  st_sf() %>% 
  rowid_to_column('hex_id')
plot(hex)
```

```{r}
points_in_hex <- st_join(logs_selected,
                         hex,
                         join = st_within)
```


```{r}
points_in_hex <- st_join(logs_selected, 
                        hex, 
                        join=st_within) %>%
  st_set_geometry(NULL) %>%
  count(name='pointCount', hex_id)
head(points_in_hex)
```

```{r}
hex_combined <- hex %>%
  left_join(points_in_hex, 
            by = 'hex_id') %>%
  replace(is.na(.), 0)
```

```{r}
tm_shape(hex_combined %>%
           filter(pointCount > 0))+
  tm_fill("pointCount",
          n = 8,
          style = "quantile") +
  tm_borders(alpha = 0.1)
```

```{r}
logs_path <- logs_selected %>%
  group_by(participantId, day) %>%
  summarize(m = mean(Timestamp), 
            do_union=FALSE) %>%
  st_cast("LINESTRING")
```

```{r}
logs_path_selected <- logs_path %>% 
  filter(participantId == "0")
tmap_mode("plot")
tm_shape(buildings)+
tm_polygons(col = "grey60",
           size = 1,
           border.col = "black",
           border.lwd = 1) +
tm_shape(logs_path_selected) +
tm_lines(col = "blue") +
tm_facets(by = "day")
tmap_mode("plot")
```
